html.body: I Like Flowers Attribute values don't require quotes. Capitalization on tags doesn't have to match. Head1 Head2 can be left out. quotes are not required on attribute values Slash indicating that HR is a void tag is optional But if the attribute value is not quoted and there is no space before the slash it will be included in the attribute. Paragraphs are auto-terminated by other paragraphs. And paragraphs can be auto-terminated by headings. Here's a heading. Some text with font stuff (HTML5 would use css). Line breaks are void tags but don't require that marking.
